Line1.E6891: I'm not dead yet, you vultures.
Line5.BAE4.Bar: Only a coward would kill someone like this.
Line5.BAE4.Dru: No one deserves such a cruel fate.
Line5.BAE4.Nec: No, but you’re getting very close.
Line5.BAE4.Rog: I see that. Should I come back later, then?
Line5.BAE4.Sor: I see that. Should I come back later, then?
Line9.E6891: Get me free. I’ll make it worth your while.
MenuLabel: (Inspect the head poking from the sand.)
VoiceDir7.E6891: At a loss, realizing the Player is not one of his enemies.
